attributes.action: Stop MPs from paying for second homes with tax payers money and lease properties to MPS instead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a national scandal that the tax payer pay for MPs second homes which they get to keep after they leave public service. The tax payer pays it so we should own it.  We want the government to buy flats/apartments in london or 30 mins from london which are leased out to MPS thats consituincy is not near london and at a time they leave office/their job they give the property back so it can leased out to the next MP.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
